title: Gamified Mathematics Education Course for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematical knowledge at the college level
context.additional_context: Improvement of practical mathematics problem-solving skills through project-based assessments in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Explain systematic strategies for solving complex math problems using gamification elements
Achieve ≥80% math problem-solving accuracy through game mechanics like digital badges and level-up systems
Complete ≥3 peer feedback-based collaborative projects through quest-style group activities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
